channel.title: References on weeeblog
channel.description: Recent content in References on weeeblog

item.title: Speed up your remote workflow
item.author: nikhilweee@gmail.com (Nikhil Verma)
item.description: Although NYU already a dedicated website with all the documentation to get started with the HPC cluster, here’s a set of tricks that I use to ease up the workflow by a significant amount. Even if you’re not affiliated with NYU, I believe you’d still be able to benefit from this post if your organization uses Slurm. Outline Getting Started 1. Passwordless SSH 2. Set up SSH aliases Login Hacks 1.

item.title: Sticky Notes
item.author: nikhilweee@gmail.com (Nikhil Verma)
item.description: This page hosts little ideas, solutions to problems I’ve faced in the past or mistakes that I don’t want to repeat again - stored here as a reference in case they bother me again. Read on, maybe even you might find something relevant! Outline Some useful aliases Docker and DC++ Test outgoing ports Use Google Fonts offline Installing Node Installing OpenCV Raspberry Pi Configure Mutt with Gmail Remove Python Package with Dependencies Academic writing with Pandoc PuDB Custom Stringifier Interesting Jekyll Themes Some useful aliases Timesync!
